Class ByteField

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.filter.Storable
      com.bizosys.hsearch.common.ByteField
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStorable
public class ByteField
extends Storable

A name-value field which stores data in byte array.
